alert.note: Alert for Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 17 at 2:45PM EST until February 17 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and sleet. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches for a storm total of 2 to 10 inches and sleet accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. The heavier storm total snow accumulations will be across the North Woods. * WHERE...Northern Penobscot, Southeast Aroostook, Northern Piscataquis, and Northern Somerset Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Friday evening commute.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet, and ice will make travel very dangerous. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Southeast Aroostook
